review: Pros:-You get to defuse the bomb with your mind 5 meters away-The Bomb Code is always the same-You get a Mushroom Hat if you have a rank-You get to buy keys but you find out you bought the wrong one-No No-Cross Map No Scopes-No Cross Map Knives-You can kill people with Decoy GrenadesCons:-Valve+Hats=Weapon Skins=Cases=Keys=$2.49/Key=Half Life 3 Confirmed.
